changes: New Parametric EQ with adjustable frequency, gain, Q factor

Parametric EQ presets save/load

MPV now works correctly in APPX sandbox
Automatic MPV extraction to user data folder
Fixed MPV detection for Microsoft Store installations
Improved WindowsApps path handling
Improved library scanning performance with batch processing
Fixed artist images not updating without restart
Added lazy loading for faster album/artist display
SQLite optimizations for large libraries
MPV bundled in app package
Playlist export/import functionality
Performance improvements
Bug fixes
Version bump
Gapless playback support
Crossfade between tracks
Major feature update
